data: PED/NEO TM Factor Replacement Von Willebrand Disease (Humate P / Wilate) Pre / Post Operative (Multi
Nurse Practitioner to Initiate the Pre Operative Transfusion phase of this PowerPlan the day before surgery
Products expire 3 hours from reconstitution. Confirm dose times with TM. Product will not be reconstituted until patient is ready for transfusion
Timed, IU, IV direct, Administer over: Refer to fact sheet/product monograph, once, instructions to nurse: Administer 5-60 minutes prior to OR
Timed, IU, IV direct, Administer over: Refer to fact sheet/product monograph, once, instructions to nurse: Administer 5-60 minutes prior to OR
Nurse Practitioner to Initiate the Post Operative Transfusion phase of this PowerPlan the day before surgery
RN to discontinue the Pre Operative Transfusion phase of this plan
Products expire 3 hours from reconstitution. Confirm dose times with TM. Product will not be reconstituted until patient is ready for transfusion
Timed, IU, IV direct,Administer over: Refer to fact sheet/product monograph, once, Instructions to nurse: Administer 12 hours post-op
Timed, IU, IV direct,Administer over: Refer to fact sheet/product monograph, once, Instructions to nurse: Administer 8 hours post-op
Timed, IU, IV direct, Administer over: Refer to fact sheet/product monograph,  q12h interval, Instructions to nurse: Administer 12 hours following the first post-op dose
Timed, IU, IV direct, Administer over: Refer to fact sheet/product monograph, q24h, Instructions to nurse: Administer 24 hours following the first post-op dose
Timed, IU, IV direct, Administer over: Refer to fact sheet/product monograph, q48h, Instructions to nurse: Administer 48 hours following the first post-op dose
Timed, IU, IV direct, Administer over: Refer to fact sheet/product monograph, once, Instructions to nurse: Administer 12 hours post-op
Timed, IU, IV direct, AAdminister over: Refer to fact sheet/product monograph, once, Instructions to nurse: Administer 12 hours post-op
Timed, IU, IV direct, Administer over: Refer to fact sheet/product monograph, q12h interval, Instructions to nurse: Administer 12 hours following the first post-op dose
Timed, IU, IV direct, Administer over: Refer to fact sheet/product monograph, q24h, Instructions to nurse: Administer 24 hours following the first post-op dose
Timed, IU, IV direct, Administer over: Refer to fact sheet/product monograph, q48h, Instructions to nurse: Administer 48 hours following the first post-op dose
Nurse to Initiate the Post Operative Labs phase of this PowerPlan when patient arrives in Anesthetic Care Unit/PACU
Conditional Order - Nurse to Place Lab Order - One Time
If/when Humate P or Wilate given, Bloodwork: von Willebrand Panel
Conditional Order - Nurse to Place Lab Order - One Time
If/when Humate P or Wilate given, Bloodwork: Factor VIII Activated Activity
